Text:
this is an amazing documentary. it hasn't received enough funding to be properly released yet. you can make a tiny donation here and then you'll feel better about ripping it ;-) http://www.wreckingcrew.tv

this is how good it is: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1185418/usercomments
This is a 3 year old copy. I heard the movie has been significantly updated and reedited since then. Anyone have a recent copy?
